statements: UPDATE player_rankings SET total_points = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_rankings SET games_played = 50, ranking_position = 1 WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE player_rankings SET total_points = total_points + 10, ranking_position = ranking_position - 1 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_rankings SET games_played = games_played + 1, total_points = total_points + 20 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET wins = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE rankings SET ranking_position = 5, ranking_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE players SET wins = wins + 1, losses = losses - 1 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE rankings SET ranking_position = 1, ranking_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE player_performance SET points_scored = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE match_results SET match_date = '2022-10-15 15:30:00' WHERE match_id = 5;
UPDATE player_performance SET matches_played = 10, matches_won = 7 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE match_results SET winner_id = 105, loser_id = 102, match_date = '2022-03-15 14:30:00' WHERE match_id = 201;
UPDATE player SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game SET game_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE game_id = 3;
UPDATE player SET player_score = 100 WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE game SET winning_player_id = 1, losing_player_id = 2 WHERE game_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE Players SET player_score = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Matches SET winner_id = 2, match_date = '2022-10-20 14:30:00' WHERE match_id = 5;
UPDATE Players SET player_score = player_score + 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Rankings SET ranking_score = ranking_score * 1.5 WHERE ranking_score > 100;
